#summary Description of the /table/join/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The game events + ack page is used to get all game events from a certain id onwards. All events before 'ack' are removed from the list.

=== Method ===
HTTP POST 

=== Request ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ack>57</ack>
}}}

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<events>
 <event id="58">Kenzo raises.</event>
 <event id="59">Guy folds.</event>
 <event id="60">Cedric calls.</event>
</events>
}}}
